Maragadha Naanayam (2017) Film Short Story :

The story tells about a diamond(Green Emerald) shaped with brilliant metal and appears as though a coin called Maragadha Naanayam. The stone was given by a Goddess to a lord for his repentance for her to cause him to reinforce to battled against the foes. Furthermore, he overcome numerous different nations as well. He passes on and make the stone himself in the tomb. Till 1990 nobody attempted to take the stone on account of dread for the rulers soul, In 1990 somebody took it from the tomb yet is bites the dust with coz of the detestable soul of the lord called Irumbarazan. 132 individuals will kicks the bucket that way. The legend accepts the position to take Maragadha Naanayam from a little Don for 100 million rupees coz that he needs 4 million ruppes for his obligation. Who one touch the stone will be murdered by Irumarazan, as a result of that each reject the activity to take the green stone business.
